  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ClassPath
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for representing classpath structure of Spring projects
    Author:
    Alexandre Le Borgne

      • findFileByPath

        public XMLFile findFileByPath(java.lang.String path,
                              XMLFile currentFile)
        Finds a XMLFile into the current ClassPath
        Parameters:
        path - of the XMLFile to find
        currentFile - in case of a relative path, should not be null
        Returns:
        the corresponding XMLFile if it exists, null otherwise

                       throws java.io.IOException,

      • getMergeableXMLFiles

                                             throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Gets the mergeable XML Spring deployment descriptors.
        Returns:
        mergeable XML Spring deployment descriptors.
        Throws:

        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur.

      • getTopDescriptions

        private java.util.List<XMLFile> getTopDescriptions(java.util.List<java.util.List<XMLFile>> cycles)
                                            throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                   java.io.IOException
        Gets the top XML Spring deployment descriptors (those which are the highest in the import chain).
        Parameters:
        cycles - cyclic XMLFiles that need to be decided between to be the top XML Spring deployment descriptor
        Returns:
        the XMLFile that declares the most import as the top descriptor
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any I/O errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur.

      • findCycle

        private java.lang.Boolean findCycle(java.util.List<java.util.List<XMLFile>> cycles,
                                    XMLFile xml)
                             throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Find the cycle a XMLFile belongs to and adds the XMLFile to this cycle.
        Parameters:
        cycles - to add the XMLFile to.
        xml - the XMLFile that is investigated.
        Returns:
        true if the cycle has been found, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any I/O errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur.

      • merge

        public void merge(java.nio.file.Path path,
                  XMLFile xml)
        Merges and writes top XML Spring deployment descriptors with their imported XMLFiles
        Parameters:
        path - the output directory
        xml - the XMLFile corresponding to the top deployment descriptor
